fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 181.72 lakh crore compared with Rs 136.43 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 40.65 points or 0.24% to settle at 16,985.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.34% to 15.45. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
